text.headline: Bachelor of Technology
text.text: Received my bachelors at Manipal Institute of Technology

text.headline: My Introduction to Corporate World
text.text: This was the time when I was recruited as a Software Engineer at Societe Generale.

text.headline: Met with an accident
text.text: After getting my clavicle bone fractured twice, I had a take a time off to rehabilitate.

text.headline: Move to a startup
text.text: After working at a Multi-National Company (Société Générale), I realised, I was ready for higher impact projects and a fast paced environment. I got my chance at Urja.io as a Lead Data Scientist.

text.headline: The American Dream
text.text: Moved to Boston, Massachusetts to pursue a Masters of Science in Information Systems.

text.headline: Conducted a workshop
text.text: Presented at AI Skunkworks' 'Generative AI Deep Dive' in partnership with the Institute for Experiential AI (Watch Video)

text.headline: Got Microsoft certified
text.text: Microsoft Certified: Azure Data Scientist Associate
